revised_title: Sidney Frederic Harmer: A Pioneering Zoologist and Taxonomist
tldr: Sidney Frederic Harmer was a prominent zoologist and taxonomist who made significant contributions to the understanding of invertebrate morphology, particularly in the field of Polyzoa. He was part of the Cambridge School of Zoology and is remembered for his meticulous work, dedication to teaching, and wide knowledge of various animal species.
